item.title: Jackass 5 Is Happening Later This Year
item.content:encoded:
There is still some good left in this world. We‚Äôre getting a new, still officially untitled, Jackass, and we don‚Äôt have to wait a decade like last time. The new comedy is set to arrive in June.

On January 8, Jackass ringleader Johnny Knoxville posted the iconic skull and crutches logo for the franchise on Instagram, with the date June 26 below it. In the text for the post, he confirmed that, yes, a new Jackass movie is a go. Expect lots of wild stunts, gross moments, and of course, some injuries.

‚ÄúWell, a wang dang and hot damn doodle, we are starting the year off with a bang,‚Äù said Knoxville on Instagram. ‚ÄúWe wanted to let you know that this summer, Jackass is back!! We will see you in theatres June 26th. More to come, but wanted you to hear it from us first!‚Äù

That‚Äôs all the official information we have at the moment. We don‚Äôt know who is returning or which guest stars will be making an appearance in the upcoming comedy flick. In the last movie, 2022‚Äôs Jackass Forever, most of the original Jackass crew from the 2000s era TV show on MTV returned, with the notable exceptions of Bam Margera and Ryan Dunn. Margera has struggled with substance abuse issues for years, and while sober now, has had a rocky relationship with the Jackass crew and is likely not returning in the next film. Dunn sadly died in 2011. His last Jackass movie was 2010‚Äôs Jackass 3. For Jackass Forever, the crew also added some younger talent to help out. No word if they will be returning this time around.

The Jackass franchise is a big success for Paramount, with the four main films, and the Bad Grandpa spin-off, bringing in over $560 million worldwide at the box office on relatively tiny budgets. There was even a Jackass video game released in 2007. It was bad. Don‚Äôt play it. 



https://kotaku.com/jackass-5-is-happening-later-this-year-2000658174
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: UGREEN‚Äôs USB-C Hub Drops Below $10, This 5-in-1 Adapter Is Selling Out Fast on Amazon
item.content:encoded:
Do you find yourself routinely trying to improve your computer setup, but you have too many cables to make it feasible? You might want to think about getting a multiport. They‚Äôre affordable, and thanks to the deal we‚Äôve located, you can get one even cheaper than usual. Plus, you can set up your workstation using just a single USB-C port.

Get the UGREEN USB C Hub 5 in 1 Multiport at Amazon for only $9.99 (from $15.99), which is a $6 discount and approximately 38% in savings. For this price, you can buy a few and change up all your computer stations just for the sake of keeping things consistent.

See at Amazon

An affordable way to improve your compact PC setup

Here‚Äôs how it works. This multi-port adapter instantly adds additional ports to your existing device‚Äôs USB-C port when plugged in. When connected via USB-C you can add peripherals like a keyboard, a mouse, a flash drive or external hard drive to your central device, all without needing to swap cables every few minutes. It can essential help turn thin laptops and tablets into more powerful desktop setups when needed. For example, it‚Äôs useful whether you‚Äôre moving between a home office, a classroom or coffee shop.

Alternatively, you can connect your device to a monitor, television or projector for a better viewing experience on a larger screen. This is beneficial for watching movies on a larger screen, displaying slides in a professional environment or extending your display to keep multiple windows open simultaneously.

As compact as they are, most hubs are designed to direct cable flow away from your hands to maintain a clean and organized workspace. The small and lightweight design of the UGREEN USB C Hub 5 in 1 Multiport makes it easy to fit into a laptop case or backpack pocket and allows you to take it wherever you go without giving it a second thought. Most importantly, this is the type of accessory you‚Äôll likely forget about until you truly need a USB port or an external display, and then you‚Äôll be happy it is available.

We‚Äôve lined out the reasons why, so it‚Äôs probably obvious by now, but this USB-C hub can make for a super useful gift or addition to anyone‚Äôs PC setup. It‚Äôs a practical and affordable upgrade that gives you plenty of space to work with when it comes to compact setups. And perhaps most importantly, it‚Äôs just $9.99. That‚Äôs super affordable, and well worth picking up whether you shop for yourself or others as a gift. Anyone can appreciate the gift of efficiency, especially in a world where complex computing can be the norm.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/ugreens-usb-c-hub-drops-below-10-this-5-in-1-adapter-is-selling-out-fast-on-amazon-2000657275

item.title: HP Rolls Out Another Laptop Deal at 65% Off, Ryzen 5 EliteBook G1 16‚Ä≥ Windows 11 Pro PC (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD)
item.content:encoded:
Grabbing a new laptop does not have to blow your budget if you know where to look. If your current machine isn‚Äôt offering the performance it once did, or your needs have grown, and you want something with a bit more muscle, Amazon is making the upgrade easy.

The retailer is currently offering a massive 65% discount on the 16-inch HP EliteBook 6 G1, which brings its price down to $900 from $2,600. You‚Äôre saving a whopping $1,700 on a device that‚Äôs made to handle both work and entertainment well, but the deal wraps up soon. Snag the drop before that happens!

See at Amazon

Efficient Performance for All Your Tasks

The HP EliteBook 6 G1a is the successor to the top-rated EliteBook 665. This machine runs on the fast and efficient AMD Ryzen 5 220 processor with a 3.2GHz base clock, boost speeds up to 4.9GHz, six cores, and 16MB of L3 cache. It‚Äôs made to handle everyday workloads, plus some resource-intensive tasks with ease. The processor is paired with a modest 16GB DDR5 SDRAM memory, which makes it easy to juggle multiple tasks at once without experiencing noticeable slowdowns. You will be able to use multiple tabs, work on a few different programs, take quick work calls, and more ‚Äì with ease. Storage-wise, you‚Äôre covered with a spacious 512GB SSD, which offers enough space to keep all your important documents, media files, applications, and even games in a single place.

The display here is a stunning 16-inch diagonal WUXGA (1920√ó1200) UWVA IPS screen that delivers impressive visuals consistently. Expect vivid details, vibrant colors, and a sharp picture clarity, whether you‚Äôre working on a creative project or just catching up with friends on a video call. Speaking of video calls, the built-in 5MP camera paired with Poly Studio tuned speakers with AI Noise Reduction makes those a breeze. You will look your best, plus be heard properly as well. What‚Äôs more, 400 nits of brightness, paired with the anti-glare coating, ensure visibility in all lighting conditions, whether you‚Äôre streaming a movie at night or working on a school assignment while soaking up some sun. Additionally, low blue light emission makes it easy to use the screen for extended periods without compromising your eye health.

Port selection is wide. We‚Äôre talking one HDMI port, one stereo headphone/microphone combo jack, one RJ-45, 1 security lock slot, two USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate (powered), two Thunderbolt 4 with USB Type-C 40Gbps signaling rate (USB Power Delivery 3.0, DisplayPort 2.1, HP Sleep and Charge). Wireless connectivity options include Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

Battery life is just as solid, and recharging doesn‚Äôt take forever, either. Those who often need to work on long documents will also appreciate the spill-resistant, backlit HP Standard Keyboard with numeric keypad that‚Äôs designed keeping comfort in mind. There‚Äôs also a fingerprint reader on the keyboard for secure logins.

Windows 11 Pro comes pre-installed, so there‚Äôs no need to worry about installing an operating system from scratch to get started, either. You can now grab this efficient mid-range laptop for just $900, after a whopping 65% discount at Amazon. It comes packed with a wide range of features that make it perfect for students, work professionals, and even casual users. Just be sure to grab yours before the price shoots back up to $2,600.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/hp-rolls-out-another-laptop-deal-at-65-off-ryzen-5-elitebook-g1-16-windows-11-pro-pc-16gb-ram-512gb-ssd-2000657117

item.title: The Stranger Things Secret ‚ÄòConformity Gate‚Äô Finale Conspiracy Is Dead
item.content:encoded:
A subset of Stranger Things fans unsatisfied with the horror series‚Äô finale have spent the last week dunking on the creators and actors and also peddling a conspiracy theory that Netflix was holding a secret finale episode that would explain away things these fans didn‚Äôt like about the existing conclusion. According to the ‚ÄúConformity Gate‚Äù theory, the ninth episode of Stranger Things‚Äô fifth season was supposed to go live on the streaming service last night, January 7, at 8 p.m. ET. The theory had become so widespread that fans claim Netflix crashed around this time as fans flocked to the streaming service and overloaded the servers. When they finally managed to get the app to boot up, they found that no such ninth episode had been published.

While the Conformity Gate theory was an interesting thought experiment, and I‚Äôll admit I watched enough videos about it that I wasn‚Äôt quite convinced but was at least willing to see it all play out, this turn of events was hardly surprising, especially after Variety published a story hours ahead of the supposed launch debunking the theory.

What is surprising, however, is just how far reaching Conformity Gate had become before it was inevitably disproven. Some corporate accounts, like the one belonging to the Empire State Building of all things, were posting about Stranger Things fans‚Äô collective psychosis, whether in genuine support of the theory or just to take advantage of a trending topic for social media engagement. The Slim Jim account is in everyone‚Äôs comments like Joyce Byers telling everyone the Conformity Gate theory is canon, to them.

Perhaps the interest of brands is understandable, though, in light of what a phenomenon Stranger Things was right up through its final episode.. The fifth season has already cracked Netflix‚Äôs top 10 all-time most-streamed series, and even if some fans online are so unsatisfied with how it all ended that they‚Äôre imagining another episode that might fix it all, the series still has enough cultural cache that every social media manager is probably looking at Conformity Gate as a chance to ride the coattails of a trend. Now, however, even people who are actually part of the Stranger Things brand are starting to post about it, and sorry to those holding out hope, but the few times that people like actor Brett Gelman have acknowledged the conspiracy, it hasn‚Äôt been to confirm it. Here he is addressing Conformity Gate by name while lipsyncing a cover of Prince‚Äôs ‚ÄúWhen Doves Cry,‚Äù specifically the line ‚ÄúMaybe you‚Äôre just like my mother, she‚Äôs never satisfied.‚Äù

The Stranger Things social media accounts also now have ‚ÄúALL EPISODES OF STRANGER THINGS ARE NOW PLAYING‚Äù in their bios, and it doesn‚Äôt get much clearer than that. The X account allegedly responsible for starting the conspiracy, @67gate, has set their profile to private. Now that the dream seems to be truly dead, fans are reacting in a lot of ways. Some are grieving, finally realizing the ending they didn‚Äôt like is, in fact, the finale of Stranger Things, while others are saying that the theory provided a fun ride for a week, and helped cushion the blow of the finale. 

Unfortunately, if you scroll through the comments on videos about there being no ninth episode, you‚Äôll also find people moving the goalpost and saying that a secret finale could still be coming, whether that be after the upcoming One Last Adventure documentary about the making of the final season, or at some other date they made up. Maybe they will return to reality in the coming days as more people disperse from the discussion.

i wanna say a huge thank you to @67gate for conformitygate this was an incredibly fun adventure and i‚Äôll never forget the mass byler canon spaces & all that. she did us all a massive favor by creating such an amazing theory better than the duffers ever could‚Äôve been capable of

‚Äî eug√®ne ñ§ù conformity gate .·êü (@emagoner) January 7, 2026

well at least we went crazy together #conformitygate pic.twitter.com/BXzDd6icnk

‚Äî emilia (@emlx_23) January 8, 2026

i still think #conformitygate is one of the coolest things ever and even if it‚Äôs not real, these theories were so interesting pic.twitter.com/DOAxbLgSv8

‚Äî kait! (@reidsgarcia_) January 8, 2026

bothering my niece who believed in #conformitygate propaganda pic.twitter.com/PfK7SI2cWv

‚Äî ùì´ùìÆùìºùìΩùì≤ùìÆ üë©üèª‚ÄçüöÄ (@bestiecinema) January 8, 2026

this theory was great either way, because now its gonna haunt the duffer brothers knowing their finale was so bad we had to theorise and crash netflix for an alternate ending that didnt exist #conformitygate pic.twitter.com/KWdUg33Wqz

‚Äî beca‚òÜ (@feefohara) January 8, 2026

#conformitygate pic.twitter.com/OBUIaxvY91

‚Äî simon (@ssantam01) January 8, 2026

‚ÄúThis whole thing has been the strangest mass delusion I‚Äôve ever seen,‚Äù Totheendofsin wrote on Reddit. That about sums it up, but if you‚Äôre tuned into enough fandoms, you‚Äôve probably seen people clowning like this. I lived through the spread of the Mass Effect 3 Indoctrination Theory years ago, and I‚Äôm sure, despite this idea of a ‚Äúsecret finale which will reveal that the bad ending was just a nightmare we‚Äôre all going to wake up from‚Äù having never actually proven true, we‚Äôll live through a Conformity Gate moment again in a few years. 

Taylor Swift fans are also notorious for looking for clues where there are none, such as when they speculated for months that a re-recorded ‚ÄúTaylor‚Äôs Version‚Äù of the artist‚Äôs Reputation album was imminent based on small hints, only for Swift to reveal months later that she‚Äôd barely recorded any of the tracks for a re-release. Theorycrafting is fun, but when you stake this level of an emotional claim in it, you‚Äôre dooming yourself to devastating disappointment.



https://kotaku.com/stranger-things-conformity-gate-secret-netflix-crash-2000658155
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot

item.title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds (2nd Gen) Launched Pricier Than AirPods Pro 3, Now Match Their Price After a Drop
item.content:encoded:
If upgrading your audio gear is on your New Year‚Äôs checklist, this deal is hard to beat. The Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds are widely praised for their exceptional noise cancellation, immersive sound quality, and all-day comfort, making them a great choice in the premium earbuds category. Right now, Amazon is offering them at a $49 discount, dropping the price from their usual $299 down to just $250 for a limited time. Whether you‚Äôre tuning out distractions during your daily commute, staying focused while working, traveling, or simply enjoying your favorite playlists at home without the whine of your toddler crying in the other room (they just never stop, don‚Äôt they?), these earbuds deliver a noticeably superior listening experience. If you‚Äôve been waiting for the right moment to invest in high-quality audio, this limited-time offer makes now an excellent opportunity to do so for less.

See at Amazon

World-Class Noise Cancellation

When paying for a premium audio accessory, you expect solid noise cancellation‚Äîand it‚Äôs the real deal here. Our sister-site Gizmodo put it through the ringer, testing the second-gen Bose QuietComfort Ultra earbuds in busy subways and crowded, chatty coffee shops. The results were it could block out everything.

In addition to Quiet Mode, the Bose QuietComfort Ultra earbuds make use of two other modes. Aware Mode is the transparency option where you can pass through the sounds of your surroundings. Wearing in-ear earbuds do a little bit of noise cancelling physically just because of how they‚Äôre design. You plug your ear with them after all. This mode will actually play the sounds from your environment that it‚Äôs picking up on its and play them through the earbuds. This is good for a range of use cases, particularly if you‚Äôre a runner training on the roads while listening to music. Best to be able to hear traffic to avoid any accidents.

The earbuds are also equipped with Immersion Mode which blends together noise-cancelling with 3D audio. This is able to track your head movements so it feels like you are surrounded on all sides by music that you can physically move throughout, even though it‚Äôs all just simulated in your ear.

You can choose between five super sleek colorways, though not all have been treated equally by the Amazon discount gods. The humble black model is right now the cheapest, so if you don‚Äôt want a pair of earbuds that are too loud (except in the traditional sense, you‚Äôre in luck. Offering slightly more pizazz is the desert gold option. These are mostly black, but with a gold accent. They‚Äôre also priced at the lowest value of $250. Just above that at $268 is a really striking midnight violet model. Then at full price still ($299,) is the white and deep plum versions.

See at Amazon



https://kotaku.com/bose-quietcomfort-ultra-earbuds-2nd-gen-launched-pricier-than-airpods-pro-3-now-match-their-price-after-a-drop-2000657843
item.dc:creator: invalid@example.com (ResetEra_Newsbot
